Scene:
Sanetsuna's Mansion
(Naoe yashiki / 直江屋敷)

Play: The Battle of Kawanakajima (信州川中島合戦)

Production: May 1973 National Theatre

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
